name: Lifting of the arms

stages.name: INITIAL STAGE
stages.description: The subject holds a bar with both hands and with arms extended along the body, slightly apart.

stages.name: TERMINAL STAGE
stages.description: The subject has to raise the arms above the head, keeping the elbows in extension in order to stretch the trunk muscles.

stages.name: RECOVERY STAGE
stages.description: Subject goes back to starting position.

requirement: The feet must always be on the ground, slightly apart, with the knees slightly flexed. The subject must avoid anterior or posterior pelvic tilt.

param_to_maximize.name: raise angles, both arms
param_to_maximize.description: angle between left/right arm and torso in the sagittal plane

param_to_maintain.name: extension angles, both elbows
param_to_maintain.description: Equal and Constant Extension angles of both elbows

param_to_maintain.name: extension angles, both knees
param_to_maintain.description: Equal and Constant Extension angles of both knees

param_to_maintain.name: extension angles, both knees
param_to_maintain.description: Equal and Constant Extension angles of both knees
